DataElement.preferredName: Response Evaluation Criteria In Lymphoma (RECIL) 2017 Assessment Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Code that represents the assessment of response to treatment for lymphoma using the Response Evaluation Criteria in Lymphoma (RECIL) 2017.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Response Evaluation Criteria In Lymphoma 2017 Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The 2017 update to an international-consensus set of response criteria for lymphoma first established in 1999. These guidelines were refined in 2007 to incorporate assessment of tumor metabolism by [18F]2-fluoro-2-deoxy-D-glucose positron emission tomography (FDG-PET) and further refined in 2017 to incorporate a scoring system to enhance the reproducibility of the interpretation and reporting of FDG-PET results, and to update the recommended procedures for staging evaluation._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The 2017 update to an international-consensus set of response criteria for lymphoma first established in 1999. These guidelines were refined in 2007 to incorporate assessment of tumor metabolism by [18F]2-fluoro-2-deoxy-D-glucose positron emission tomography (FDG-PET) and further refined in 2017 to incorporate a scoring system to enhance the reproducibility of the interpretation and reporting of FDG-PET results, and to update the recommended procedures for staging evaluation.

Concepts.definition: The 2017 update to an international-consensus set of response criteria for lymphoma first established in 1999. These guidelines were refined in 2007 to incorporate assessment of tumor metabolism by [18F]2-fluoro-2-deoxy-D-glucose positron emission tomography (FDG-PET) and further refined in 2017 to incorporate a scoring system to enhance the reproducibility of the interpretation and reporting of FDG-PET results, and to update the recommended procedures for staging evaluation.

Property.preferredDefinition: Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the response criteria (includes RECIST and others) and associated documentation of disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for NCI-INC0370865 19C0076 qns curation. 4.17.19 mc

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Greater than or equal to 10 percent decrease in the sum of longest diameters of target lesions but not a partial response.

Concepts.definition: Greater than or equal to 10 percent decrease in the sum of longest diameters of target lesions but not a partial response.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Greater than 20 percent increase in the sum of longest diameters of target lesions; For small lymph nodes measuring less than15 mm post therapy, a minimum absolute increase of 5 mm and the long diameter should exceed 15 mm; Appearance of a new lesion.

Concepts.definition: Greater than 20 percent increase in the sum of longest diameters of target lesions; For small lymph nodes measuring less than15 mm post therapy, a minimum absolute increase of 5 mm and the long diameter should exceed 15 mm; Appearance of a new lesion.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Less Than 10 percent decrease or less than or equal to 20 percent increase in the sum of longest diameters of target lesions.

Concepts.definition: Less Than 10 percent decrease or less than or equal to 20 percent increase in the sum of longest diameters of target lesions.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Greater than or equal to 30 percent decrease in the sum of longest diameters of target lesions but not a complete response.

Concepts.definition: Greater than or equal to 30 percent decrease in the sum of longest diameters of target lesions but not a complete response.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Complete disappearance of all target lesions and all nodes with long axis less than10mm; greater than or equal to 30 percent decrease in the sum of longest diameters of target lesions (partial response) with normalization of FDG-PE.

Concepts.definition: Complete disappearance of all target lesions and all nodes with long axis less than10mm; greater than or equal to 30 percent decrease in the sum of longest diameters of target lesions (partial response) with normalization of FDG-PE.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the response criteria (includes RECIST and others) and associated documentation of disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

Concepts.definition: A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created for NCI-INC0370865 19C0076 qns curation request. 4.17.19 mc

DataElement.changeDescription: Created for NCI-INC0370865 19C0076 qns curation request. 4.17.19 mc
